CustomField.description: Contact Title format for email template usage
CustomField.formula: IF( FIND(" ", Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)=0, UPPER(LEFT(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1))&MID(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,2,100), IF( FIND(" ",MID(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)+1,LEN(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name)-FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)))=0, UPPER(LEFT(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1))& MID(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,2,FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)-1)&" "& UPPER(MID(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)+1,1))& MID(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)+2,100), UPPER(LEFT(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1))& MID(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,2,FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)-1)&" "& UPPER(MID(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)+1,1))& MID(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)+2,FIND(" ",MID(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)+1,LEN(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name)-FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)))-1)& UPPER(MID(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,FIND(" ",MID(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)+1,LEN(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name)-FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)))+FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)+1,1))& MID(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,FIND(" ",MID(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)+1,LEN(Contact.Account_Title__r.Name)-FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)))+FIND(" ",Contact.Account_Title__r.Name,1)+2,100)))
CustomField.label: Contact Title Email Form
